name: PLUGMAX
description:
1 minute to learn the rules!
3 minutes to master the controls!
5 minutes and you'll be battling players from around the world!
Go for Max Power! Plug Max!

・This game uses very little text, so it's easy to play regardless of what language you speak.
・Instructions are available in English, Chinese (Simplified & Traditional), Korean, and Japanese.
・"Plug Max" is the championship title given to the greatest plug of all!
・Be warned, young apprentice. The Way of the Plug is not an easy one.
・Updates are planned to add new rules and sound effects, and to adjust game balance.
